title: Implement Generic Double Deallocation Trait
description: In this lab, a generic DoubleDrop trait is defined, which includes a double_drop method that allows a type to deallocate itself and an input parameter.

meta.title: Rust Programming | Generic DoubleDrop Trait
meta.description: Learn how to define a generic DoubleDrop trait in Rust, which allows types to deallocate themselves and an input parameter.
meta.keywords: Rust, Programming, Traits, Generic, DoubleDrop, Deallocation
